TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpTransportElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransportElement

summary.span: 表示組態項目，指定傳輸 SOAP 訊息的 HTTP 傳輸。

span.span: Represents the configuration element that specifies an HTTP transport for transmitting SOAP messages.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowCookies { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowCookies : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出用戶端是否接受 Cookie 並依未來要求傳播 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

value.span: 如果允許 Cookie，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if cookies are allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您與使用 Cookie 的 ASMX Web 服務互動時，可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property when you interact with ASMX Web services that use cookies. 如此一來，從伺服器傳回的 Cookie 就一定會自動複製到該服務未來所有的用戶端要求。In this way, you can be sure that the cookies returned from the server are automatically copied to all future client requests for that service.

member this.AuthenticationScheme : System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證配置，用於驗證由 HTTP 接聽程式處理的用戶端要求。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication scheme used to authenticate client requests being processed by an HTTP listener.

value.span: 物件，指定用於用戶端驗證的通訊協定 (Protocol)。

span.span: The object that specifies the protocols used for client authentication.

value.span: 預設值為 Anonymous。

span.span: The default is Anonymous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證配置只能設定一次。The authentication scheme can only be set once.

member this.BypassProxyOnLocal : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否忽略本機位址的 Proxy。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether proxies are ignored for local addresses.

value.span: 如果忽略本機位址的 Proxy，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if proxies are ignored for local addresses; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本機位址是位於本機 LAN 或內部網路上的位址。A local address is one that is on the local LAN or intranet. 如果服務位址開頭一律忽略 proxy http://localhost。Always ignores the proxy if the service address begins with http://localhost. 如果您想用戶端與同一部電腦上的服務通訊時通過 proxy，您應該使用主機名稱，而不是 localhost。You should use the host name rather than localhost if you want clients to go through a proxy when communicating with services on the same machine.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值會指定如何在比對 URI 時使用主機名稱取用服務。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

value.span: 值，指定當傳送傳入要求至端點 URI 時，如何包含主機名稱。

span.span: The value that specifies how the hostname is included when routing incoming requests to an endpoint URI.

value.span: 預設值是**StrongWildcard**，其中忽略主機名稱比對。

span.span: The default value is **StrongWildcard**, which ignores the hostname in the match.
